alert.note: Alert for Alleghany (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 25 at 2:31PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Alleghany County in northwestern North Carolina, south central Wythe, southwestern Carroll and eastern Grayson Counties in southwestern Virginia and the City of Galax through 315 PM EDT... At 231 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Independence, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Galax... Independence... Fries... Speedwell... Baywood... Ivanhoe... and Elk Creek. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
